About

A detailed description of application

  • UI/Frontend

    Collecting user inputs (html, pug, jquery, bootstrap, selectize)

    Crypto currencies :-

    you can select single/multiple currencies. Graph is shown for all the selected currencies. Hence, enabling user for easy comparision.

    Days (0 - 250):-

    This defines how many day's worth of graph would you like to view.

    today = 0 days with historic type

    yesterday = 1 days with historic type

    tomorrow = 1 days with prediction type

    Note: Error is shown as 0 is not allowed with prediction type as it is considered as today

    Action Type :-

    Historic Data = this provides data from today to previous (n) days. n being the numberOfDays selected in earlier form field.

    Predictions = this provides data from tomorrow to (n-1) future days. n being the numberOfDays selected in earlier form field.

  • Backend

    Fetch and Predict future price (Python3, flask, pandas, yfinance)

    For each crypto currencies selected in the list, check the type of action needs to be performed.

    Historic Data :- Get previous data from yahoo-finance

    Prediction :- Prepare the historic data for modelling, feed it to the net and train the model.

    The model predicts crypto prices for given number of days.

    Note:

    We are using pre-designed MLP Neural Network-Tensorflow (3- hidden levels). The performance can be optimized by changing the network structure or by changing to LSTM or RNN network.

  • UI/Frontend

    Displaying the graph

    (axischartjs,bootstrap,jquery,

    lodash,moment)

    X-axis : dates

    Y-axis : currency prices

    Note:

    Loading spinner will be visible untill the graph is generated

    Hovering over the graph lines will show price values for all the visible currencies

  • Start
    Comparing
